p: The pathomechanisms of pneumonia in COVID-19 disease are poorly understood. Data available from histopathological slides indicate pulmonary edema, of primary respiratory origin, and thick proteinaceous exudates consisting of large protein globules associated with hyperplasia of the pneumocytes. Additionally, vascular engorgement and interstitial inflammatory process, involving fibrinoid material and multinucleated tissue macrophages, have been reported [ 55].
